comments:
Eclipse 3.1 M6 under both Linux and Windows. We wrote our own wizard without
specifying a wizard title image. Eclipse throws a null pointer exception when
trying to display the default image. I think I tracked it down to
ImageDescriptor.createFromFile(Wizard.class, "images/page.gif") returning null
on lines 70 and 71 of org.eclipse.jtest.wizard.Wizard.java

The problem does not happen under Eclipse 2.1 or 3.0

Here is the stack trace:

can't replicate this with  either of them.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 90453 ***

Just to be clear: it's not the constructor of the wizard page that throws the
NullPointerException, but rather eclipse code as outlined in the original bug
report.
Thanks Roberto - I will paste this in the first report.
